response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "At 22 years old, youth is associated with increased risk, though not extreme."),
    ("arrest record", "medium", "One prior arrest without conviction indicates some interaction with the system but not a severe criminal history."),
    ("education", "low", "Holding a high school diploma without further education suggests average stability."),
    ("employment", "medium", "Having held only one job in the past year may indicate some economic instability."),
    ("substance use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years reduces risk substantially."),
    ("mental health", "low", "Not feeling depressed in the past month suggests stable mental health."),
    ("household background", "low", "Growing up in an average household size does not contribute significant risk."),
    ("religiosity", "low", "Belief that God influences personal outcomes can be a protective factor.")

  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: At 22 years old, youth is associated with increased risk, though not extreme.
One prior arrest without conviction indicates some interaction with the system but not a severe criminal history.
Holding a high school diploma without further education suggests average stability.
Having held only one job in the past year may indicate some economic instability.
No drug use in the past four years reduces risk substantially.
Not feeling depressed in the past month suggests stable mental health.
Growing up in an average household size does not contribute significant risk.
Belief that God influences personal outcomes can be a protective factor.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived in a household of size 4. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
